comments.body: there are already tests in pandas/tests/extension/base/methods.py are these supplmental?

Extension arrays and PandasArrays do not have the same interface, so the tests in pandas/tests/extension/base/methods.py will not work for PandasArrays. E.g. ``.value_counts``, ``.count`` etc. are not found in PandasArrays (or numpy arrays).

BTW, I copied these tests from pandas/tests/series/test_analytics.py.
